title: Art Bell's Dark Matter 2013-10-09 - Andrew Karam - Fukushima
description:
Dark Matter 2013-10-09 Wednesday

Dr. Andrew Karam will discuss the Fukushima reactor accident and the Yucca Mountain nuclear waste facility.


Bio
Andrew Karam has worked in radiation safety for over 30 years, starting with an 8-year stint in the NavyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s nuclear power program that included nearly four years on a nuclear attack submarine. Since then he has held a number of positions in various aspects of radiation safety, including stints as a professor, a consultant, and in environmental remediation; in the last several years his work has concentrated on matters related to radiological emergency response Ã¢â‚¬â€œ most recently traveling to Japan in the aftermath of the Fukushima reactor accident.

In addition to his work, Andrew has earned a doctorate in Environmental Science, he is the author of a number of books on various science-related topics (and nearly two dozen scientific and technical papers), and he has given over 100 scientific presentations on his research and his work.
